1.name: 1. The Twilight Zone
1.description: Ordinary people find themselves in extraordinarily astounding situations, which they each try to solve in a remarkable manner.

2.name: 2. Bonanza
2.description: The Wild West adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their Nevada ranch while helping the surrounding community.

3.name: 3. Suddenly, Last Summer
3.description: A surgeon is assigned the case of a young woman whose aunt wants her lobotomized to cover up a family secret.

4.name: 4. Some Like It Hot
4.description: After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

5.name: 5. North by Northwest
5.description: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and falls for a woman whose loyalties he begins to doubt.

6.name: 6. Ben-Hur
6.description: After a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend in 1st-century Jerusalem, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

7.name: 7. Sleeping Beauty
7.description: After being snubbed by the royal family, a malevolent fairy places a curse on a princess which only a prince can break, along with the help of three good fairies.

8.name: 8. Rio Bravo
8.description: A small-town sheriff in the American West enlists the help of a disabled man, a drunk, and a young gunfighter in his efforts to hold in jail the brother of the local bad guy.

9.name: 9. Rawhide
9.description: Gil Favor is trail boss of a continuous cattle drive. He is assisted by Rowdy Yates. The crew runs into characters and adventures along the way.

10.name: 10. Harold and the Purple Crayon
10.description: A little boy takes a walk, using his purple crayon to create everything he encounters along the way.

11.name: 11. Anatomy of a Murder
11.description: An upstate Michigan lawyer defends a soldier who claims he killed an innkeeper due to temporary insanity after the victim raped his wife. What is the truth, and will he win his case?

12.name: 12. House on Haunted Hill
12.description: A millionaire offers $10,000 to five people who agree to be locked in a large, spooky, rented house overnight with him and his wife.

13.name: 13. The Hangman
13.description: U.S. Marshal Bovard comes to a small border town to identify and arrest a fugitive, but the whole town seems determined to prevent the Marshal from doing his job.

14.name: 14. Journey to the Center of the Earth
14.description: An Edinburgh professor and assorted colleagues follow an explorer's trail down an extinct Icelandic volcano to the earth's center.

15.name: 15. Dennis the Menace
15.description: Television episodes built around the same sorts of incidents found in Hank Ketcham's long-running comic strip.

16.name: 16. Imitation of Life
16.description: An aspiring white actress takes in an African American widow whose mixed-race daughter is desperate to be seen as white.

17.name: 17. On the Beach
17.description: After a global nuclear war, the residents of Australia must come to terms with the fact that all life will be destroyed in a matter of months.

18.name: 18. The 400 Blows
18.description: A young boy, left without attention, delves into a life of petty crime.

19.name: 19. Gidget
19.description: A young girl discovers surfing and love (in that order) during one transitive summer.

20.name: 20. Laramie
20.description: In the 1870s Wyoming Territory, Slim Sherman and his 14-year-old brother Andy try to hang on to their ranch after their father's death.

21.name: 21. Hawaiian Eye
21.description: The cases of Hawaiian Eye Private Investigations and the two handsome, slick, tough-guy detectives who ran the firm, Thomas Jefferson Lopaka, or Tom for short, and Tracy Steele, a Korean War veteran and former city police detective.

22.name: 22. The Untouchables
22.description: Special Agent Eliot Ness and his elite team of incorruptable agents battle organized crime in 1930s Chicago.

23.name: 23. Hiroshima mon amour
23.description: A French actress filming an anti-war film in Hiroshima has an affair with a married Japanese architect as they share their differing perspectives on war.

24.name: 24. King of the Wild Stallions
24.description: A young widow and her son on an isolated ranch find themselves being protected by a wild stallion.

25.name: 25. The Many Loves of Dobie Gillis
25.description: A young man schemes and attempts to get the "better things in life" mostly popularity, success, and most importantly, girls.
